channel.title: How can i make htis welcome message
channel.description:
Hi lets get to the point I want to know how to make a really cool welcome sort of thing in game. hmm how can i explain this when you log in you would see this screen http://i51.tinypic.com/mukdvt.png[/img] but in a welcome with play.
So if you could tell me how to do that or make one please post I will give credits saying at the bottom of the welcome Welcome message created by (name)
thank you

item.title: How can i make htis welcome message
item.dc:creator: @anthony12309 anthony12309
item.description:
@anthony12309 wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

That’s as simple as it gets.

I want to learn more about rsps how did you start off? Im only 13 so there is plenty of time to learn

oh and I found exactly what im looking for i want it to look like this
